description:
From our law office in Manchester, New Hampshire, the attorneys at Hage Hodes, PA provide unmatched counsel and support to clients across New Hampshire and Massachusetts. Our team is capable of handling a broad range of matters in the following practice areas:

  • Business and corporate law
  • Civil and business litigation
  • Employment law
  • Estate planning, probate and adult guardianships
  • Bankruptcy and debt relief
  • Family law
  • Intellectual property
  • Insurance law
  • Personal injury
  • Professional malpractice
  • Real estate law

Regarded as one of the area's leading general practice law firms , Hage Hodes has served the residents and businesses of our region for more than 40 years. Our attorneys are licensed to practice in multiple states, federal courts, as well as the U.S. bankruptcy court and have extensive litigation and transactional experience, which allows us to actively and effectively protect our clients.

We provide creative solutions to the important and complex legal issues affecting our clients, their families, their companies and their future. Backed by our decades of combined legal experience, our attorneys' extensive knowledge and resources allows us to aggressively and effectively protect your interests. Honored for our professionalism and service, Hage Hodes has been recognized by national publications as a leading law firm along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers.

Hage Hodes has relationships with other regional, national and international law firms to assist our clients with specialized services beyond the borders of New Hampshire and Massachusetts. As a small dynamic firm with strong business and ethical values, we believe we can meet our clients' complex and ever-changing needs on a local, regional, national, and international level.

To discuss your needs with no risk, you can contact Hage Hodes, PA to take advantage of our free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
